name: First Impact: Rise of a Hero
description: First Impact: Rise of a Hero immerses you in a beautiful comic book world where you can run, jump, fly, and summon elemental powers to protect citizens. Experience a lush array of islands and cityscapes and uncover the truth about a mysterious force sending meteors to Earth. For PC & VR!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 Processor: Intel i5-4590 Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 Storage: 3 GB available space Additional Notes: Non-VR Version does not require as high of a minimum specs in order to run well.
